Monster.Name: Iron Defender
Monster.HPRoll: equal to five times your level in this class +your Intelligence modifier + the iron defender’s Constitution modifier

MonsterTrait.Name: Might of the Master
MonsterTrait.Text: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the iron defender’s skill bonuses, the bonuses to hit and damage of its bite, and the number of hit points restored by its Repair action.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Repair (3/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The magical mechanisms inside the iron defender restore 2d8 + 2 hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it

MonsterTrait.Name: Defensive Pounce
MonsterTrait.Text: The iron defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the iron defender.
